testsuite.system-out: ?[1;31m Start test 1?[0m The coffee machine has: 400 ml of water 540 ml of milk 120 ml of coffee beans 9 disposable cups $550 of money Write action (buy, fill, take): > take Collecting $550 of money The coffee machine has: 400 ml of water 540 ml of milk 120 ml of coffee beans 9 disposable cups $0 of money ?[1;31m Start test 2?[0m The coffee machine has: 400 ml of water 540 ml of milk 120 ml of coffee beans 9 disposable cups $550 of money Write action (buy, fill, take): > buy What do you want to buy? 1 – espresso, 2 – latte, 3 – cappuccino: > 1 The coffee machine has: 150 ml of water 540 ml of milk 104 ml of coffee beans 8 disposable cups $554 of money ?[1;31m Start test 3?[0m The coffee machine has: 400 ml of water 540 ml of milk 120 ml of coffee beans 9 disposable cups $550 of money Write action (buy, fill, take): > buy What do you want to buy? 1 – espresso, 2 – latte, 3 – cappuccino: > 2 The coffee machine has: 50 ml of water 465 ml of milk 100 ml of coffee beans 8 disposable cups $557 of money ?[1;31m Start test 4?[0m The coffee machine has: 400 ml of water 540 ml of milk 120 ml of coffee beans 9 disposable cups $550 of money Write action (buy, fill, take): > buy What do you want to buy? 1 – espresso, 2 – latte, 3 – cappuccino: > 3 The coffee machine has: 200 ml of water 440 ml of milk 108 ml of coffee beans 8 disposable cups $556 of money ?[1;31m Start test 5?[0m The coffee machine has: 400 ml of water 540 ml of milk 120 ml of coffee beans 9 disposable cups $550 of money Write action (buy, fill, take): > fill How much water do you want to add? > 2001 How much milk do you want to add? > 510 How much coffee beans do you want to add? > 101 How much disposable cups do you want to add? > 21 The coffee machine has: 2401 ml of water 1050 ml of milk 221 ml of coffee beans 30 disposable cups $550 of money
